rooms.description: A welcoming space with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows letting natural light flow in. The design follows Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy.
Open plan living area with Mediterranean style decor and floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views of the central courtyard. Incorporates natural materials like terracotta tiles.
Spacious kitchen designed with modern Mediterranean touches and energy efficient appliances. Layout considers Vastu by aligning the cooking area towards the east.
Compact bathroom integrated into the ground floor layout with water-saving fixtures and minimalistic design.

openings.location: Multiple walls of living room and entrance hall
